meta._et_pb_old_content:
Life Sciences Employment Solutions

Completing rigid R&D and testing cycles. Adhering to exacting protocols. Executing studies accurately and efficiently. Shortening time to market.

Meeting challenges like these starts with having the right talent. ClinLab Staffing delivers. With a sole focus on the life sciences industry, we recruit specialized experts to support a wide range of academic and industrial environments.

From individual placements to large projects, we ensure that every scientific initiative is safe, timely, successful, and profitable.

Industries Supported:

  • Biotech
  • Pharmaceutical
  • Medical Devices
  • Diagnostic
  • Clinical Research Organizations (CRO)
  • Clinical Manufacturing Organizations (CMO)
  • Hospitals
  • Academia
  • Chemical Engineering
  • Biofuels
  • Chemical/Polymer Technology

Disciplines Supported:

  • Research and Development – Analytical, Synthetic/Organic and Polymer Chemistry, Biochemistry, Bioanalytical, Molecular and Cell Biology, Pharmacology, Microbiology
  • Process Development
  • Manufacturing
  • Quality Control
  • Quality Assurance
  • Regulatory Affairs
  • Drug Safety
  • Medical Writing
  • Facilities and Operations

Work with a partner who understands the unique challenges emerging industries face – and rapidly delivers the specialized scientific talent you need.

ClinLab Search: Recruiting & Staffing Services for the Life Sciences Industry

Contact us at 508-907-6222. Let us put you first.
